speaker: Roshea
text: I still don't believe it. I cannot believe Prince Marth would have such ambitions.

speaker: Wolf
text: What? Are you saying that Emperor Hardin lied? Do you think that he would stoop to such a low!? Enough, Roshea!! You disappoint me, if you want to betray us then go ahead. Sedgar, Vyland, let's go. If we're too slow, they will pass us.

speaker: Roshea
text: Hey, wait! I won't betray you. I understand... I'll go.

speaker: Marth
text: The Wolfguard of Aurelis! Must we fight them as well...?

speaker: Jagen
text: Sire, please hold on. We've just received word from a messenger of King Aurelis. It seems Aurelis has no plans to war... According to the messenger, King Aurelis wishes to parley with you in the village.

speaker: Marth
text: What? What could this mean? That the Wolfguard is moving independent of Aurelis's orders?

speaker: Jagen
text: I don't know, but... Depending on how negotiations go, it's possible the Wolfguard may signal a retreat.

speaker: Marth
text: I see. It would benefit us all if we could avoid pointless fighting. Let's hurry to the village!

speaker: King Aurelis
text: Oh, Prince Marth. It is good to see you.

speaker: Marth
text: Huh, aren't you King Aurelis?! What are you doing here?

speaker: King Aurelis
text: I came here to stop my country's army. Also I must apologise to your highness. I believed Hardin's words and followed Archanea, but I now realize my wrongs. Archanea's Empress Nyna secretly sent me a letter, saying that Hardin isn't normal and is ill... My country will remain neutral, and its knights will return to Aurelis. I hope you won't attack my men anymore.

speaker: Marth
text: I understand, your highness. I don't want to fight with you. Please forgive me for taking so many of your knights' lives.

speaker: King Aurelis
text: Oh! You really are like what the rumors say. My body is frail and I have no children, and even Hardin, my younger brother, has completely changed. Prince Marth, please protect Aurelis in my place. I will hand my whole country to you. I give this jewel to you as a gift. This is a magical jewel containing the divine power of life. I spent a lot of gold to buy it from a travelling merchant. I believe it will be useful to you. Don't worry about Hardin. Since he is a knight, it is natural for him to die in battle. That is his fate. Well, Prince Marth, I will go on ahead. I hop you will all be safe...

speaker: Roshea
text: I am Roshea of the Aurelis knights. I don't want to fight, but I can't betray my companions. Please forgive me...

speaker: Vyland
text: As long as we're here, we won't let you get to Millennium Court. If you don't want to die, run back to your country!

speaker: Sedgar
text: You... Why are you invading other countries? Have you been blinded by ambition?

speaker: Wolf
text: The leader of Aurelis' knights, Wolf, is here for your head!

speaker: Wolfguard
text: Lord Hardin...

speaker: Marth
text: Kris, we've made it through. The palace is not far. I have only you to thank for this. You do nothing but help me.

speaker: Kris
text: No, it's not like that. It was your decision, sire. I just came up with the idea.

speaker: Marth
text: That's hardly the whole truth. The times when I'm lost in my thoughts, if you're there, I have confidence. I'm thankful for that; more than anything.

speaker: Jagen
text: Sire, we've just received urgent news. Apparently a coup d'etat broke out in the palace. The knights and citizens who opposed Emperor Hardin's ways rose in rebellion.

speaker: Marth
text: What in the blazes?! What has happened to them now?

speaker: Jagen
text: Unfortunately, the instigators were all defeated and captured... Rumor has it that the rebels are being executed by the day.

speaker: Marth
text: Damn it, Hardin... This is absurd. It's decided. We will head for the palace at once and end this. Kris, let's go!!

speaker: Kris
text: Yes, sire!

speaker: Marth
text: Kris, we've made it through. The palace is not far. I have only you to thank for this. You do nothing but help me.

speaker: Kris
text: No, not at all. I just made a random suggestion.

speaker: Marth
text: That's hardly the whole truth. The times when I'm lost in my thoughts, if you're there, I have confidence. I'm thankful for that; more than anything.

speaker: Jagen
text: Sire, we've just received urgent news. Apparently a coup d'etat broke out in the palace. The knights and citizens who opposed Emperor Hardin's ways rose in rebellion.

speaker: Marth
text: What in the blazes?! What has happened to them now?

speaker: Jagen
text: Unfortunately, the instigators were all defeated and captured... Rumor has it that the rebels are being executed by the day.

speaker: Marth
text: Damn it, Hardin... I can't believe it. It's decided. We will head for the palace at once and end this. Kris, let's go!!

speaker: Kris
text: Yes, sire!

speaker: Marth
text: Kris... The final battle is nigh. Medeus awaits us up ahead. It won't be an easy battle... I dare not imagine how many of us will be left standing at the end... Either way, the fate of this world rests on our hands...

speaker: Kris
text: Sire... Worry not, sire. We will emerge victorious. That's what the fortune-teller said.

speaker: Marth
text: Fortune-teller?

speaker: Kris
text: When I was a child, I asked our village's fortune-teller for a reading... The old lady held the palm of my hand, and said to me... "Ah, your fate is clear to me, child."

speaker: Marth
text: And? What did she say?

speaker: Kris
text: She said that I would "grow up to be a legendary hero..."

speaker: Kris
text: She said that I would "live out my life quietly..."

speaker: Kris
text: She said that I would "follow my calling like an arrow..."

speaker: Kris
text: She said that I would "devote my life to the service of others..."

speaker: Kris
text: She said that I would "be stupidly rich and famous..."

speaker: Marth
text: Oh...? I can imagine that happening...

speaker: Kris
text: And she said that I'd live until I was a hundred years old...!

speaker: Marth
text: 'Til a hundred...? That is an awfully long time... Oh, I see...! If the fortune-teller was right, then...

speaker: Kris
text: Then we are definitely walking out of this hall victorious. I'm not quite that old yet... So, rest easy, sire.

speaker: Marth
text: Haha, you're quite right. I... feel much calmer now. Thank you, Kris...

speaker: Marth
text: I see my sister and the others... But who are they guarding...? No, it can't be... That's--that's Medeus...!

speaker: Jagen
text: With the princesses around him, sire, you'll be unable to strike down Medeus. If we don't do something soon, then the other dragons will awaken, and this battle will rapidly escalate into mayhem.

speaker: Marth
text: Then, what do you suppose I do? How on earth can we save them?! Tell me, Jagen!

speaker: Jagen
text: I... I do not know... But, if we are to defeat Medeus, we must stop at nothing...

speaker: Marth
text: What?! ...You can't mean to kill them?!

speaker: Jagen
text: It may be... necessary. As they are now, they suffer greatly. We must save them, even if it should cost them their lives...

speaker: Marth
text: Jagen, this--is this really a decision I must make?

speaker: Jagen
text: You are Altea's crown prince, sire. A ruler must be ready for anything, though it may cost them their happiness. That is all.

speaker: Marth
text: Enough, Jagen. I understand. Still, I cannot accept it. There must be another way. Even till the very end, I will never give up!!

speaker: Jagen
text: Kris, I know how Prince Marth feels. Please, I beg of you... Please find a way to save them.

speaker: Kris
text: Understood. I will try my best. But if the occasion should arise... Even if Prince Marth himself refuses, I shall release them from their misery... But for now... I don't want to think about it. I still want to hope.

speaker: Jagen
text: Kris......

speaker: Julian
text: Lena, snap out of it! C'mon, it's me! Julian! What's wrong with you, Lena? I know I'm a good-for-nothing scoundrel, but for you, I'd do anything. I don't want anything else-- I just want to see your smile again. Hey, Lena; could you smile for me? Please...

speaker: Lena
text: Oh... Julian...? You came. I knew you'd find me. I knew it. That's why, I could continue struggling in the darkness of my soul... Julian, I'm sorry. I've always been a bother to you.

speaker: Julian
text: Are you kiddin' me, Lena...? I'm just happy to hear your voice again.

speaker: Lena
text: Julian, there's something I'd like very much. Will you listen?

speaker: Julian
text: Huh? Sure, Lena, hit me. So long as it's within my power...

speaker: Lena
text: Could you call me... "honey"? You're always "Lena" this and "Lena" that. You speak as though we're barely friends-- and I don't like that feeling. That just won't do, especially not after we settle down together in Macedon.

speaker: Julian
text: Huh? ...What're you talking about, Lena...? Er... I mean... H-honey... Don't tell you and I are gonna...

speaker: Lena
text: Uh-huh... I'm sure God will forgive me. After all, you... You mean the world to me.

speaker: Minerva
text: Maria! Please, wake up! It's me, Minerva! What's happened to you?! Get a hold of yourself.

speaker: Maria
text: Unh... Ah... Minerva... A-ahhhhhh! Medeus is...

speaker: Minerva
text: Shh. It's alright now. Everything's going to be okay. I'm so sorry, Maria. I've left you alone for so long...

speaker: Maria
text: Minerva... I was scared... I was so scared... Oh! How is Michalis? I think he fought Gharnef to save me.

speaker: Minerva
text: Michalis... is fine. Don't worry, Maria.

speaker: Maria
text: Really? Then, once we go home, we'll be together again just like before? I'm so glad, Minerva! Oh, I hope we can see him soon.

speaker: Minerva
text: Maria......

speaker: Nyna
text: Ahh... I've done something terrible. I was too foolish... I hurt Hardin... I drove him to despair.

speaker: Sirius
text: My queen... Prince Marth has ended Hardin's suffering. The Emperor loved you till the very end. He was sorry for what he'd done to you. It's alright now. You need not worry. It was all just a bad dream...

speaker: Nyna
text: ...... Who......? Oh...! You're... Camus...?! Camus!! Why... Why are you... This is a dream, isn't it?

speaker: Sirius
text: Nngh! ...My queen... You are mistaken... I am Sirius, a soldier of the allied forces. I know not of this Camus...

speaker: Nyna
text: Sirius...?! ...It can't be... No! You're wrong!! You're...

speaker: Sirius
text: Please, calm yourself; you must be exhausted. I must depart soon. Queen Nyna, listen to me... You should head to Prince Marth.

speaker: Nyna
text: You... Where are you going?

speaker: Sirius
text: I must go to my country. There's... someone waiting for me.

speaker: Nyna
text: Is... Is that so...? I see... Sirius... Thank you. I am most grateful.

speaker: Sirius
text: ...Forgive me...

speaker: Nyna
text: Pardon...?!

speaker: Sirius
text: No... It is nothing... Now, Queen Nyna; go!

speaker: Merric
text: Princess Elice! It's me, Merric. Snap out out of it! I--I studied magic ferociously, all so that I could protect you... I'm sorry... I failed. I couldn't be by your side, when you needed me most. Elice... Please. Please open your eyes!

speaker: Elice
text: Merric...? ...Ah! Oh, Merric! Help me... Gharnef is... I'm so frightened... Please help me!

speaker: Merric
text: Elice! Thank goodness, you've come back! It's alright now. I'm here, so... Oh... but Prince Marth is... Everyone's watching, so we can't... Oh well... *ahem* Elice, I'll never leave your side again. No matter what may come between us... Never again shall I abandon you!

speaker: Elice
text: Forgive me, Marth... I've been such a burden.

speaker: Nyna
text: We're all safe now. We're free of the Shadow Dragon's power.

speaker: Maria
text: Prince Marth! Finish him off!

speaker: Lena
text: We will heal the wounded, so that no one else shall die...

speaker: Kris
text: Sire, good news. The princesses have come back to us. Your kindness has saved their souls.

speaker: Marth
text: Thank goodness. I'm too happy for words. I suppose some battles require sacrifice... But that matters not... I won't give up--not now, not ever! Together, we will win this battle!

speaker: Medeus
text: YOU PRESUMPTUOUS HUMANS... HOW DARE YOU--!

speaker: Marth
text: Shadow Dragon Medeus! Now, nothing stands between this blade and you. Come, let's settle this!

speaker: Medeus
text: I HAVE... REVIVED... FOOLISH HUMANS... I WILL LEAVE... NONE ALIVE...

speaker: Medeus
text: DO YOU PLAN TO... DEFY ME ONCE MORE... DESCENDANT OF ANRI...?

speaker: Marth
text: No matter how many times you return, mankind will never surrender! This long battle... I will end it here, once and for all!

speaker: Medeus
text: A MERE HUMAN SUCH AS YOURSELF... WISHES TO CHALLENGE ME...? HOW FOOLISH...

speaker: Kris
text: I have come this far, just for this moment. My death means nothing, for Prince Marth will create a bright future for us all...! As long as I have that hope, I'll fight on. I'll come at you with everything I've got!

speaker: Elice
text: WE WILL KILL ALL... WHO DEFY... LORD MEDEUS...

speaker: Maria
text: WE WILL KILL ALL... WHO DEFY... LORD MEDEUS...

speaker: Nyna
text: WE WILL KILL ALL... WHO DEFY... LORD MEDEUS...

speaker: Lena
text: WE WILL KILL ALL... WHO DEFY... LORD MEDEUS...

speaker: Maria
text: Ah, Minerva, sister...

speaker: Nyna
text: Camus... Save me...

speaker: Elice
text: Ah, Merric...

speaker: Lena
text: Ah, Julian...

speaker: Kris
text: Sire, the war council will begin soon.

speaker: Marth
text: Thank you, Kris... Huh? Wh-what happened to your hair...?

speaker: Kris
text: Sir Xane did it for me. He said that a legendary power would enter me if I wear this tiara. And this hairstyle complements it. Anything to become stronger...

speaker: Marth
text: ...L-legendary power? Oh, Xane's handiwork, I see. He can certainly be a handful...

speaker: Soldier
text: General, the missing Altean remnants have finally returned.

speaker: Eibel
text: Really? Haha...! What good timing. We will follow our original plan. Have Gra's soldiers move out to lure them and then defeat them in one go.

speaker: Soldier
text: Understood, but, what about "him"?

speaker: Eibel
text: The paladin, Abel? It doesn't matter if he betrays me! If he does, you will kill the female hostage!! He has already retired from the army. He won't swear loyalty to the prince again. Ha ha...! How will they avoid fighting Abel...? This will be very interesting to watch...

speaker: Dolph
text: Prince Marth, I have been waiting for you. And you have finally returned.

speaker: Marth
text: Oh! Dolph! You're a general of Archanea, though; why would you come to my side?

speaker: Dolph
text: I've given up my position and have left Emperor Hardin's side. There is no justice left in Archanea. But justice lies in your Altea. And that's why I've come to you.

speaker: Marth
text: I see. Then Dolph, will you fight with us?

speaker: Dolph
text: Indeed I shall. Let this battle be a testament to my faith in you.

speaker: Marth
text: Abel!? Why are you... I don't believe this, you're betraying your homeland!?

speaker: Abel
text: Lord Marth... Please forgive me... They took Est... If I didn't fight... They would kill her. ...But after meeting your highness, I can no longer... fight... against Altea... Est... I'm sorry, please forgive me!!

speaker: Est
text: Abel... Im sorry, you must have suffered.

speaker: Abel
text: Est!! Youre safe.

speaker: Est
text: Yes, Lord Marth rescued me. Im alright now.

speaker: Abel
text: Really...? Damn, Archanea... But how should I apologize to Lord Marth?

speaker: Est
text: Im sorry... It was all because of me.

speaker: Abel
text: No, Est! It was nothing to do with you!! Those fools... I wont forgive them... Ill show them how deep my anger is!!

speaker: Old Man
text: In the forts are many enemies. Don't be careless.

speaker: Woman
text: Oh, you... Where did you all go to? You all went missing for so long that everyone became very worried about you.

speaker: Young Man
text: The Kingdom of Gra views Altea as its enemy. But, in reality, they were forced to fight because of their alliance with Archanea.

speaker: Woman
text: After Altea fell, Elice was taken to an unknown place by a black-robed bishop... Oh... Princess Elice... I pray that you are safe and well...

speaker: Young Woman
text: Since being ruled by the imperial army, our days have been difficultly passed. But, we all believed that Lord Marth would definitely come back for us. He would rescue us all from our suffering... Because, our Lord Marth is the warrior of light chosen by the deities... the Starlord!

speaker: Young Man
text: Nearby are enemy spies. Be careful! They will come from the forts.

speaker: Young Man
text: The mercenaries protecting the castle are Altea's elites. It would be great if they could become your allies.

speaker: Man
text: Oh, your highness, you've finally come. I have been waiting, to give this to you. However this village and the neighboring village...

speaker: Marth
text: Mmm, I understand. But, for the sake of everyone, you should start to make up with them...

speaker: Abel
text: Your highness... Please forgive me... I don't want to lose Est...

speaker: Abel
text: Est...

speaker: Eibel
text: What! Being able to defeat my great army. Are you even human?

speaker: Eibel
text: My Archanea army could be defeated...?

speaker: Marth
text: That was quite a battle. Is everyone alright?

speaker: Jagen
text: There's no need for concern, sire. Everybody has eagerly awaited this day.

speaker: Kris
text: Sir Jagen speaks truly. We've been fighting for this day-- the day we reclaim our homeland.

speaker: Marth
text: Yet, because of Archanea's actions, so many innocent lives have been lost. How can I face them...? I've caused them great sorrow. Because I was too weak... Was I presumptuous in believing I could protect my homeland?

speaker: Kris
text: Sire... Do you remember, sire? The words you said to us on the very first day of our training?

speaker: Marth
text: Kris...... Of course. I could never forget......

speaker: Marth
text: Alone, I am powerless. So, everyone. From now on, I want you to lend me your power, as my knights.

speaker: Kris
text: Upon hearing your words, I decided that I would work hard, so that I could be of assistance to you, sire. I want to become like you. There is no need for you to shoulder everything on your own. Your pain, and your suffering... They are not yours to bear alone. I will always be by your side.

speaker: Marth
text: Kris......

speaker: Jagen
text: Sire, chin up! We must still recapture Altea Castle. I believe that our enemies are well prepared for us, but it is our castle. We know it better than they do. Sire, give us the command! We will fight to recover our home!!

speaker: Marth
text: That was a tough battle. Is everyone alright?

speaker: Jagen
text: Don't worry, sire. Everybody has eagerly awaited this day.

speaker: Kris
text: Sir Jagen speaks truly. We've been fighting for this day-- the day we reclaim our homeland.

speaker: Marth
text: Yet, so many innocent lives have been stolen by Archanea. No apology is worthy for them... I've caused them great sorrow. Because of my unreliability... Was I presumptuous in believing I could protect my homeland?

speaker: Kris
text: Sire... Do you remember, sire? The words you said to us on the very first day of our training?

speaker: Marth
text: Kris...... Of course. I could never forget......

speaker: Marth
text: Alone, I am powerless. So, everyone. From now on, I want you to lend me your power, as my knights.

speaker: Kris
text: Upon hearing your words, I decided that I would become your strength, sire. I wish to be your sword. There is no need for you to shoulder your burden alone. Your pain, and your suffering... Do not let them be yours to bear alone. I will always be by your side.

speaker: Marth
text: Kris......

speaker: Jagen
text: Sire, chin up. We must still recapture Altea Castle. I believe that our enemies are well prepared for us, but it is our castle. We know it better than they do. Sire, give us the command! We will fight to recover our home!!

speaker: Marth
text: By the way, Kris, About your tiara... Did it work? Did you feel the, er, legendary power?

speaker: Kris
text: No, I didn't feel any different.

speaker: Marth
text: As I suspected... Kris, I believe Xane pulled a fast one on you.

speaker: Kris
text: I-is that so...?

speaker: Marth
text: In light of this, would you like to return your hair to the way it was before?

speaker: Kris
text: Yes, thank you.

speaker: Marth
text: Good, I'm glad we've sorted that out.

speaker: Jagen
text: Kris, we've returned at long last. We're back where it all began...

speaker: Kris
text: Yeah. It's a curious feeling. It feels like yesterday that I first stepped foot here and yet it seems so far away...

speaker: Jagen
text: Yes, I remember. When you first arrived here for training, you had no experience of battle. And now...

speaker: Marth
text: How disgraceful... Thieves inside our fair castle? What if they've stolen the Geosphere?

speaker: Jagen
text: Sire, we've sighted a suspicious-looking thief making his way north. We should capture him before it's too late.

speaker: Kris
text: Sire, if you'd allow me the honor, I will go. Your orders, please.

speaker: Marth
text: How disgraceful... They let thieves inside the castle? What if they've stolen the Geosphere?

speaker: Jagen
text: Sire, we've sighted a suspicious-looking thief making his way north. We should capture him before it's too late.

speaker: Kris
text: Sire, if necessary, I shall recover it. Your orders, my lord!

speaker: Macellan
text: Prince Marth. Please, hold on.

speaker: Marth
text: Macellan! Did you come here with Dolph?

speaker: Macellan
text: Correct. Dolph and I are going to be your reinforcements. Archanea has nothing left for me. For the justice that I believe in, allow me to fight by your side again, Prince Marth.

speaker: Soldier
text: Lord Willow, permission to open the door and attack?

speaker: Willow
text: Wait. Don't be so hasty. Inform me as soon as any of the chests in the treasury are opened. We will sortie the moment that happens. Both the thieves and the Alteans will want their greasy hands on the loot. While they're busy trying to unload the chests, we will take that chance and attack. Heh heh... This is a battle of intellect, not brawn. Don't forget! Attack when the chests are sprung!

speaker: Astram
text: You foul traitors! Taste the might of my Mercurius!

speaker: Astram
text: Midia...

speaker: Jeorge
text: Astram, how are you doing?

speaker: Astram
text: So it's the traitor, Jeorge. What do you want with me?

speaker: Jeorge
text: Wait, Astram. General Eibel has already fallen. You won't be able to win even if you continue fighting.

speaker: Astram
text: You want me to surrender...? Never! Even if I am the last one standing. I am a warrior of Archanea to the end!!

speaker: Jeorge
text: Why are you... Who are you fighting for? Are you fighting for Emperor Hardin?

speaker: Astram
text: No! It's not because of that man, but because of Nyna... And for Archanea!!

speaker: Jeorge
text: But, did Nyna tell you to fight here? Do you really think that Nyna would hope for this kind of battle?

speaker: Astram
text: Well... I hadn't seen Nyna for a while. I was told that she fell ill, and that I couldn't see her. But... Since Hardin is Emperor of Archanea, I have no choice. If I don't follow his orders I will become a traitor, and I will be betraying Nyna.

speaker: Jeorge
text: Astram, Nyna already entrusted the Emblem to Prince Marth. Do you understand the meaning of her actions?

speaker: Astram
text: Wh-what!! When did this happen, Jeorge? Nyna requested Prince Marth for help?

speaker: Jeorge
text: I believe that is the only explanation. Astram, if you want to find out the truth then come with us... If you die here, what will Midia do? You must live on, for her. You must live on, so you can confirm with your eyes what is happening.

speaker: Astram
text: Hmm... I guess I have no choice. But, Jeorge. If this war is as Hardin said, and was caused by Prince Marth's ambitions. I will never forgive you! Remember that!!

speaker: Willow
text: Hahaha... It's time for me to show you... The destructive power of my Meteor magic...

speaker: Willow
text: Emperor Hardin, forgive me...

speaker: Kris
text: Sire. It's over.

speaker: Jagen
text: At long last, Altea is ours once more.

speaker: Marth
text: We've all the reason to be happy. But is there news of Elice...?

speaker: Kris
text: Sire. We have routed the enemy.

speaker: Jagen
text: At last, Altea is ours once more.

speaker: Marth
text: Yes, it's a wondrous feeling. But is there news of Elice...?

speaker: Gotoh
text: Prince Marth... Can you hear me? I hate to be the bearer of bad tidings, but it would seem that Princess Elice has been kidnapped by Gharnef.

speaker: Marth
text: Lord Gotoh... Do you speak truly?!

speaker: Gotoh
text: I have found out that Gharnef commanded his priests to search for clerics of noble birth. It is most likely that Lena and your sister were spirited away by Gharnef.

speaker: Marth
text: It can't be! What does he intend to do with them!?

speaker: Gotoh
text: That, I do not know. But something foul is on the cards. There can be no doubt of Gharnef's involvement in this series of unfortunate events.

speaker: Marth
text: Lord Gotoh! Where is Gharnef now?

speaker: Gotoh
text: I believe Princess Nyna is his next target. He is probably... at Archanea's palace.

speaker: Marth
text: I understand. Then I too shall go to Archanea. I still have to free Hardin from the Darksphere's influence. I will defeat the Dark Pontifex Gharnef, and rescue my sister--no, I'll save all of them!

speaker: Marth
text: Hello Kris. It's been too long since we last spoke casually in Altea Castle. This place holds a lot of memories for you, doesn't it? Your long days of training... Not to mention you met Katarina here...

speaker: Katarina
text: I-I'm sorry. I was in a hurry, and... Excuse me, did you come here to become an Altean knight as well?

speaker: Kris
text: ............ Ah! Sire...... Please be careful.

speaker: Marth
text: Kris?

speaker: Kris
text: I sense the same enemy presence... as that time. They may already be close...

speaker: Jagen
text: Sire! We're under attack! It's the assassins!

speaker: Marth
text: Begin preparations for a counterattack immediately!

speaker: Marth
text: Hello Kris. It's been too long since we last spoke casually in Altea Castle. This place holds a lot of memories for you, doesn't it? Your long days of training... Not to mention you met Katarina here...

speaker: Katarina
text: I-I'm sorry. I was in a hurry, and... Excuse me, did you come here to become an Altean knight as well?

speaker: Kris
text: ............ Ah! Sire...... Please be careful.

speaker: Marth
text: Kris?

speaker: Kris
text: I sense the same enemy presence... as that time. They may already be close...

speaker: Jagen
text: Sire! We're under attack! It's the assassins!

speaker: Marth
text: Begin preparations for a counterattack on the double!
